keyMoments.description: It's revealed that Mihawk single-handedly destroyed their entire armada of 50 ships when they entered the Grand Line.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the vast power difference between East Blue pirates and Grand Line level warriors. Shows how unprepared the Krieg Pirates were for the Grand Line.

keyMoments.description: With Mihawk departing, Don Krieg and his remaining crew begin their invasion of the Baratie.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the final confrontation of the Baratie arc.
